forumNotes.author: NetRock
forumNotes.content:
Hi,

I know xBoot supports \*.ISO files, but is there a way to*use bootable \*.img file* instead of \*.ISO files.

Thank you for your help.

forumNotes.author: steve6375
forumNotes.content:
Not sure. XBoot support from the author is no longer available as,sadly, the author (Shamur) died a few years ago and we don't have the source files.

Try Easy2Boot.
